problem_text_cn: 一条排水管的截面如图所示,已知排水管的半径OB=10,水面宽AB=16,则截面圆心O到水面的距离OC是()
problem_text_en: The section of a drainage pipe is shown in the figure. Given that the radius of the drainage pipe OB = N_0 and the water surface width AB = N_1, the distance OC from the center of the section circle O to the water surface is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵OC⊥AB,OC过圆心O点,∴BC=AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×16=8,在Rt△OCB中,由勾股定理得:OC=√{OB²-BC²}=√{10²-8²}=6,
raw_comment: 本题考查了勾股定理和垂径定理的应用,关键是求出BC的长．
